Gaithersburg.New Mark Commons: New Mark Common is a historic planned development in Rockville, Maryland. It consists of a residential area south of Maryland Avenue and east of Interstate 270, and is accessed via Potomac Valley Road an New Mark Esplanade. It was planned and built as a collaborative effort by the architectural firm Keyes, Lethbridge & Congdon and builder Edmund S. Bennett, and was built between 1967 and 1973.
